channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Everything’s supposedly rosy on Wall Street—but gold is rallying higher as investors seek safety in government shutdown
item.description: Gold is nearing $3,870 as investors flock to safe-haven assets despite Wall Street optimism, Fed rate cut bets, and recession fears fading.

item.title: Success can be a trap. How to avoid being a one-hit wonder
item.description: It’s the dream: You finish a huge project that wins widespread acclaim—from your boss, your peers, your clients, your friends and family. You’re flyin...

item.title: 4 Tips for Handling a Top Performer’s Resignation Without Losing Momentum
item.description: When a star employee leaves, it can feel like a major setback, but it’s also an opportunity to reassess your team’s strengths, uncover hidden talent, ...

item.title: Like it or not, healthcare influencer marketing is a thing. Should your brand join in?
item.description: Think about the last piece of health advice you actually followed. Chances are, it wasn’t from a medical journal or even a doctor’s office. Most likel...

item.title: Landing on the S&P 500 means a sure-fire stock boost—and a pleasant surprise for the CEO
item.description: The good news came out of the blue in September for Robinhood, and resulted in its stock jumping 16%.

item.title: No, AI Isn’t Actually Stealing Jobs, Says a New Yale Study
item.description: In the report, economists argue that concerns over AI job losses may be overblown.

item.title: How transportation startups feel about Trump 2.0
item.description: Trump’s executive orders on drone delivery and air taxis have some companies making bold product timelines.

item.title: Wall Street Doesn’t Care About a Government Shutdown
item.description: The S&P 500 hit a new record high as the government shutdown began.

item.title: The 2025 Top 50 Leadership and Management Experts
item.description: Who makes my update list? More importantly, whom are some of the experts you should listen to?

item.title: Meta is exploiting the ‘illusion of privacy’ to sell you ads based on chatbot conversations, top AI ethics expert says—and you can’t opt out
item.description: Linguist and AI critic Emily Bender says the shift could incentivize Meta to design its AI to prod users into even more conversations.

item.title: This Robotics Startup Just Emerged From Stealth With $300 Million to Create an ‘AI Scientist’
item.description: Periodic Labs will use robots to conduct experiments and accelerate scientific discovery.

item.title: Mark Cuban says Trump’s new drug platform could succeed if it forces pharma managers to change: ‘If that happens, Trump gets all the credit’
item.description: Cuban’s Cost Plus Drugs, which he founded in 2022, similarly provides direct-to-consumer discounted pharmaceuticals.
